headline: Host Hotels & Resorts Announces Second Quarter Dividend
summary: BETHESDA, Md., June 12, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Host Hotels & Resorts, Inc. (NASDAQ: HST) (the “Company”), the nation’s largest lodging real estate investment trust, today announced that its board of directors authorized a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.20 per share. The dividend is payable on July 15, 2025, to stockholders of record as of June 30, 2025. ABOUT HOST HOTELS & RESORTS Host Hotels & Resorts, Inc. is an S&P 500 company and is the largest lodging real estate investment trust a

headline: Sell Alert: REITs Getting Disrupted By The AI Revolution
summary: The AI revolution is impacting real estate. See here to know which sectors to watch, and the REITs to avoid for smart investing in this evolving market landscape.
